headline: Orion, Corning, FuelCell Energy, 3D Systems, and Rivian Shares Plummet, What You Need To Know
summary: A number of stocks fell in the afternoon session after the broader U.S. stock market declined amid investor caution and a pullback in technology stocks.

headline: Corning Rides on Strength in Consumer Electronics: Will it Persist?
summary: GLW surges on strong Specialty Materials demand as premium glass adoption climbs across top smartphone makers.

headline: A Fresh Look at Corning (GLW) Valuation Following Strong Earnings and New AI-Driven Partnerships
summary: Corning (GLW) is seeing fresh interest from investors after strong quarterly results and upbeat guidance caught attention. The company’s move to partner with Ensurge Micropower on solid-state microbatteries reflects its ongoing push into next-generation markets. See our latest analysis for Corning. Corning’s share price momentum is turning heads, with a 90.56% year-to-date share price return as investor optimism builds on the back of strong earnings and a spate of new partnerships, including...
